BuxomMod:CommonPower.NAME: Buxom
DESCRIPTIONS: Breast size increased. Generate this many Bounce stacks each turn.

BuxomMod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
enemy.
enemies.

BuxomMod:KCupPower.NAME: K-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCapacity 0-5. At the end of your turn, gain #b
block.

BuxomMod:KCupPower2.NAME: K-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCapacity 0-5. At the end of your turn, gain #b
block.

BuxomMod:MCupPower.NAME: M-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCapacity 5-10. At the start of your turn, draw #b
cards and gain twice that much block.

BuxomMod:ChibiPower.NAME: Chibi
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill, gain an effect at random equal to its cost: NL gain Buxom, gain Chibi, deal damage to one enemy equal to your Chibi.

BuxomMod:ButtonHazardPower.NAME: Button Hazard
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b
to a random enemy whenever you gain Buxom.

BuxomMod:ReliefPower.NAME: Relief
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
Block whenever you Exhaust a card.

BuxomMod:MeasurementPower.NAME: Measurement Time
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
Block. NL Decreases by 4 each time your buxommod:Buxom increases.

BuxomMod:ShockPower.NAME: Omega Shock
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have a Status card in your hand, deal damage equal to your buxommod:Buxom to a random enemy.

BuxomMod:TCupPower.NAME: T-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCapacity 10-15. NL Gain [E] and #b
Dexterity each time your Buxom increases.

BuxomMod:MilkPower.NAME: Milk
DESCRIPTIONS: Converts into #yTemporary #yHP at the end of your turn. NL Can be spent by Chibis and cards for effects.

BuxomMod:LactatingPower.NAME: Lactating
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
#yMilk at the start of your turn. Decreases by 2 each turn.

BuxomMod:BigBouncePower.NAME: Big Bounce
DESCRIPTIONS: Generate a #yBounce with every 7 Bounce stacks instead, and change them to #yBig #yBounces.

BuxomMod:NakedPower.NAME: Naked
DESCRIPTIONS: Can't gain block. Every time you gain #yBuxom, draw #b
card(s).

BuxomMod:BouncePower.NAME: Bounce
DESCRIPTIONS: For every 7 stacks, generate a #yBounce status card.

BuxomMod:WhiteBikiniCupPower.NAME: White Bikini
DESCRIPTIONS: Capacity 0-20. Whenever you gain *Lactating, gain *Buxom and *Milk. At the end of your turn, gain 1 buxommod:Lactating.
